title: Make each of Jhins shots apply the speed boost.
body:
And have crit only increase the % movespeed buff. Playing Jhin in the early game is the most depressing feeling in the game currently with zero sustained DPS, mobility, or self peel as compared to some ADCs with all three (such as tristana).
 If he is going to have a nonexistant E I feel he could atleast use this.

replies.body: Almost like he has a weak solo early game to make up for the fact he deletes anyone that gets CCed and is a late-game terror that requires zero skill or aim.
You just summarized the ADC role in general, get real.

Sure, on a basic level, adcs take no skill due to only right clicking. However, playing adc is actually challenging since it is very stressful (you die = the game in late game), you need to position well to not get 1 shot by assassins and not get caught by mages, laning can be difficult to not die from mage support and to not get caught by hook supports and other engage sups, etc. Many adcs have barely any tools that allows them to survive when an assassin goes onto them, of course there is the support but you can't do much by yourself. A mage, on the other hand, will usually have cc and they can get zhonya (adcs can take stopwatch now, but that give no stats and only a 1 time use).
Just going to say, I don't play adc anymore and now I only play top or jungle, haven't played top on this account yet but I have played top a ton on my alternate account, managing to get d5.

Try building ghostblade first with comet as your keystone. He is actually pretty good right now, at least for solo queue. He has surprising damage with lethality because of the removal of armor seals. I've been having a lot of success with it. Especially because ardent censor isn't the terror it used to be.

I wouldn't be opposed to him getting an early game movement speed buff if he gets a late game movement speed nerf.  If Juggernauts are forced to be slow I see no reason why a Marksman should be allowed to run literal circles around them.

I feel like the juggernauts themselves need reworks. There a few good enough designs to the point that they don't need a rework like trundle, shyvana, (poppy? I swear she is still listed as a juggernaut). Usually, they have limited counter play and are oppressive in lane while being weak in teamfights due to kiting from mages and adcs. I don't think Jhin needs a buff in ms but not only due to how the ms buff counters juggernauts.
A juggernaut by design is slow, has limited cc, and does a ton of damage if he gets close to a target. However, this design by itself will be toxic and broken in low elo and weak in high elo if they are balanced (this might be a reason darius receives nerfs even thought he might have been balanced in high elo before those nerfs).
